issues.description: Epic to track all work related to the core AI model that converts a sketch image into HTML/CSS code.
As a user, I want to sign up for a new account using my email and password so I can save my projects.
As a user, I want to be able to upload a PNG or JPG image of my sketch via a drag-and-drop interface.

issues.summary: TASK: Set up S3 bucket for image storage
issues.description: Configure a new AWS S3 bucket with public-read access (or a signed URL generator) to store all user-uploaded sketches.

issues.summary: UI-FIX: Upload button overflows on mobile (Safari)
issues.description: On Safari on iOS, the 'Upload Sketch' button text is wrapping incorrectly, breaking the layout of the main page. Needs CSS fix.

issues.summary: TASK: Implement AI model API client
issues.description: Create a backend service/client to send the preprocessed image to the main AI conversion model API (e.g., GPT-4o, Claude 3) and receive the code.
As a user, after my sketch is processed, I want to see the generated HTML/CSS rendered in a live preview iframe.
As a user, I want to be able to download the generated HTML and CSS files, likely as a .zip archive.

issues.summary: TECH-DEBT: Move AI conversion to background worker
issues.description: The AI conversion API call can take up to 30 seconds. This should not block the main request thread. Refactor to use an async worker (e.g., Celery, SQS).

issues.summary: PERF: Add loading state for conversion
issues.description: Right now, the UI just hangs while the conversion is happening. Add a loading spinner and a text update ('Processing sketch...').
The API gateway or server is configured with a 5MB request body limit. This is causing 413 'Payload Too Large' errors. Need to increase limit or implement chunked upload.
As a logged-in user, I want to see a gallery or list of my previously converted sketches on a 'My Projects' dashboard.
Configure GitHub Actions (or similar) to automatically run tests and deploy the frontend (e.g., to Vercel) and backend (e.g., to AWS) on merge to main.

issues.summary: ACC: Add keyboard navigation to upload modal
issues.description: The file upload modal cannot be easily navigated using only a keyboard. Focus is not trapped, and buttons are not reachable.

issues.summary: DOCS: Write API documentation for conversion endpoint
issues.description: Create public-facing API documentation (using Swagger/OpenAPI) for the /api/v1/convert endpoint for users who want to integrate programmatically.

issues.summary: AUTH-102: Password reset email not sending
issues.description: The 'forgot password' flow completes, but the email (via SendGrid) is not being delivered. Check API keys and sender configuration.
